home.heroSubtitle: We deliver London's freshest flowers and most special gifts to your door the same day.

aboutUsPage.aboutTitle: About Us - Fesfu UK | London's Premier Marketplace
aboutUsPage.aboutDescription: From a local florist to London's fastest online marketplace. We deliver flowers, tech, fashion, and gourmet food with same-day delivery service.

homePage.homeTitle: Fesfu UK | Same Day Delivery Marketplace - London
homePage.locationTitle: Shop Flowers, Tech & Gifts in London | Fesfu UK
homePage.homeDescription: London's favorite marketplace. Shop fresh flowers, electronics, books, fashion, and gifts. Order by 18:00 for guaranteed same-day delivery.

contactPage.contactDescription: Need help with your order? Contact Fesfu support team for inquiries about deliveries, returns, or becoming a vendor. We are here to help.

faqPage.faqDescription: Find quick answers about delivery times, return policies for electronics & perishables, and payment methods. Your guide to shopping on Fesfu.

favouritesPage.title: My Wishlist | Fesfu - Save for Later
favouritesPage.description: Curate your perfect shopping list. Save your favourite flowers, gadgets, books, and fashion items to buy later with a single click.

legalPage.title: Legal & Privacy Policy | Fesfu UK
legalPage.description: Transparent terms for a fair marketplace. Read about our privacy policy, consumer rights, and refund rules for digital and perishable goods.

myOrdersPage.title: Track My Order | Fesfu UK
myOrdersPage.description: View order history and track live deliveries. Check the status of your flower bouquet, electronics, or fashion items in real-time.

registerCourierPage.title: Courier Jobs London | Join Fesfu Delivery Team
registerCourierPage.description: Drive with Fesfu. Earn competitive income delivering flowers, food, and parcels across London. Flexible hours, instant payouts. Apply now.

registerPage.title: Sign Up | Join Fesfu Marketplace
registerPage.description: Create a free account to unlock exclusive deals. Shop thousands of products from local and global brands with fast checkout and secure payment.

vendorRegistrationPage.title: Sell on Fesfu | Become a Vendor Partner
vendorRegistrationPage.description: Grow your business with Fesfu. Reach millions of London customers selling flowers, electronics, food, or fashion. Low commissions, high support.

productDetailPage.defaultDescription: Browse our exclusive collection. Fast delivery within London and secure payment options.

contact.infoTest: We are here for your questions, suggestions or complaints.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successSubMessage: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

about.ourMission: We Deliver Happiness Right on Time
about.ourHistory: Founded in London in 2024, Fesfu UK set out to deliver the freshest flowers and most special gifts to your loved ones. Our aim is not just to deliver a product, but to help you express your feelings in the best way by shortening distances.
about.sameDayDeliverySub: For orders placed before 18:00 within London.
about.freshnessGuaranteeSub: The freshest flowers selected from the auction every morning.
about.whyChooseUsSub: We combine our global experience with local touches. We support local florists while providing corporate service quality. Our courier team delivers your flowers carefully, gently and with a smile.
about.comment: add information about couriers and shops later and update about us page

favorites.favoritesDescription: We keep your favourite products here.
favorites.favoritesEmpty: You haven't added any favourites yet.
favorites.favoritesEmptyDesc: You haven't added any products to your favourites list yet. How about discovering the freshest flowers and gifts?

forgotPassword.passwordForgottenDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.

legal.pageNotFoundDesc: The legal document you are looking for has been moved or updated.

privacyPolicy.firstDesc: Fesfu UK operates in full compliance with the UK Data Protection Act 2018 and UK GDPR. We value the trust you place in us to deliver your emotions, and we are committed to protecting your personal data.

secondDesc.part1: Identity & Contact: Name, email, and phone number are processed strictly for order fulfillment, digital receipts, and delivery updates.
secondDesc.part2: Delivery Information: Recipient details are shared ONLY with our vetted Courier Team and the specific Vendor fulfilling your order.
secondDesc.part3: Transaction Security: IP address and device data are logged to prevent fraud and ensure a secure shopping environment.

privacyPolicy.thirdDesc: We do NOT store credit card details. All payments are processed via Stripe's encrypted infrastructure, ensuring bank-level security with 3D Secure.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Service & Happiness Guarantee
termsOfUse.firstDesc: This agreement is between you (BUYER) and the Vendor, facilitated by Fesfu UK acting as a COMMERCIAL AGENT. We ensure transparency and quality in every transaction.
termsOfUse.secondDesc_part2: A) PERISHABLE GOODS (Flowers, Food): Legally, the Right of Withdrawal does not apply. HOWEVER, if your order arrives damaged or withered, please contact us within 24 HOURS with a photo. We will verify with the Vendor and make it right (Refund or Re-delivery).
termsOfUse.secondDesc_part3: B) DURABLE GOODS (Electronics, Books): You have the legal right to return these items within 14 days of delivery. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and resellable.
termsOfUse.thirdDesc: For 'Same Day Delivery' in London, orders must be placed before 18:00. While we strive for perfection, Fesfu is not liable for delays caused by extreme force majeure events (e.g., severe weather), though we will always communicate with you.

termsOfCookies.title: Cookie Policy
termsOfCookies.firstTermDesc: Cookies are small text files saved to your browser. We use them to make your shopping experience smooth, keep your surprise gifts in the cart, and ensure the site works fast.

secondTermDesc.firstDesc: Strictly necessary for payment processing and secure login. Without these, the shop cannot work.
Remember your preferences (Language, Currency) to save you time.
secondTermDesc.thirdDesc: Help us understand which products you love most, allowing us to improve our service.

termsOfCookies.thirdTermDesc: You can manage cookies via browser settings. Blocking essential cookies may prevent you from completing your order.

membershipAgreement.title: Membership Agreement
membershipAgreement.firstDesc: By creating an account on Fesfu UK, you agree to these terms. You must be at least 18 years old to become a member.

secondDesc.part1: Account Security: You are responsible for keeping your password confidential. Fesfu is not liable for unauthorized access due to weak passwords.
secondDesc.part2: Accuracy: You declare that all information (Name, Address, Phone) provided during registration is accurate and up-to-date.
secondDesc.part3: Prohibited Conduct: Users cannot manipulate prices, use bots, or attempt to hack the platform. Such actions will result in an immediate ban.

membershipAgreement.thirdDesc: Fesfu reserves the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms, engage in fraud, or abuse the refund policy.

termsModal.agree: I have read and agree to these Terms

first.title: 1. INTRODUCTION & ROLE OF PLATFORM
first.desc: These Terms govern the purchase of goods via Fesfu UK ('Platform'). Fesfu acts as a COMMERCIAL AGENT (Intermediary) for third-party Vendors. By placing an order, you acknowledge that the contract of sale is formed directly between you (Buyer) and the Vendor, facilitated by Fesfu. We are responsible for transaction processing and delivery coordination.

second.title: 2. DELIVERY & LIABILITY
second.desc: We aim to deliver within the selected time slot. For perishable goods (flowers/food), if the recipient is unavailable, the courier may leave the item in a 'Safe Place' or with a neighbor (Standard UK Practice). Fesfu is not liable for failed deliveries due to incorrect addresses provided by the Buyer.

third.title: 3. CANCELLATION & RETURN POLICY (MIXED GOODS)
third.desc:
Under the Consumer Contracts Regulations 2013, rights vary by category:
A) Perishable Goods (Flowers, Food): NO Right of Withdrawal exists unless the item arrives damaged/defective.
B) Durable Goods (Electronics, Books, Fashion): You have a statutory right to cancel within 14 days. Items must be returned unused in original packaging.
Defective Items: Under the Consumer Rights Act 2015, if any item is not as described, you are entitled to a refund/replacement if reported within 24 hours with photographic evidence.

fifth.title: 4. DATA PROTECTION & PRIVACY
fifth.desc: Your personal data (Name, Address) is processed in strict compliance with the UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018. It is shared strictly with the relevant Vendor and Courier solely for the purpose of order fulfillment. We never sell your data to third parties.

first.title: 1. INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR STATUS
first.desc: The Courier agrees to provide services as a self-employed 'Independent Contractor'. This agreement does NOT create an employer-employee relationship. You are solely responsible for your own taxes (HMRC Self Assessment) and National Insurance contributions.

second.title: 2. SERVICE STANDARDS & CARE
second.desc: The Courier must exercise maximum care to maintain the integrity of goods (especially fragile flowers or electronics). Deliveries must be completed within the assigned time windows. Proof of Delivery (Photo/Signature) is mandatory for all high-value items.

third.title: 3. DATA PROTECTION & CRIMINAL LIABILITY (GDPR)
third.desc: Customer data (Address, Phone) provided to you is for DELIVERY PURPOSES ONLY. Under the Data Protection Act 2018; saving this data, contacting the customer for personal reasons, or sharing it with others is a CRIMINAL OFFENCE. Any breach will result in immediate contract termination and legal prosecution.

first.title: 1. PARTIES & PURPOSE
first.desc: This Agreement permits the Vendor to list and sell products on the Fesfu Marketplace. The Vendor retains legal ownership of goods until the point of sale. The Vendor warrants that they are a legal business entity authorized to sell these goods in the UK.

second.title: 2. COMMISSION & PAYMENTS
second.desc: Fesfu charges a commission fee (e.g., 10% + VAT) on the gross value of each confirmed order. Payouts are processed weekly. Fesfu reserves the right to withhold payments in cases of high dispute rates, suspected fraud, or breach of terms.

third.title: 3. PRODUCT LIABILITY & COMPLIANCE
third.desc: The Vendor guarantees that all listed goods comply with the Sale of Goods Act 1979 and (for food) UK Food Safety Standards. The Vendor is solely liable for costs arising from returns due to poor quality, incorrect description, or lack of conformity. Fesfu accepts no liability for the safety/quality of Vendor products.

fourth.title: 4. DATA PROCESSING (GDPR)
fourth.desc: The Vendor agrees to process customer data solely for order fulfillment in accordance with UK GDPR. Using customer data for direct marketing (spam) without explicit consent is strictly prohibited and grounds for immediate ban.

FAQ.faqDescription: Find answers to your questions about orders, delivery, and payment.

items.q: How can I track my order?
items.a: You can track the instant status of your order from the 'My Orders' menu after logging in.

items.q: Which areas do you deliver to?
items.a: We currently deliver only within London.
Yes, orders placed before 18:00 are delivered the same day.

items.q: Are the flowers and products fresh?
items.a: Yes, fresh flowers are sourced daily from the auction every morning, and perishable foods are prepared fresh.
You can pay securely via Credit/Debit Card (secured by Stripe infrastructure).

features.desc1: Order by 18:00 in London, we deliver today.
features.desc3: Carefully prepared packages and gift notes.
features.desc4: Watch your courier arrive at the door.
